title: Brimhaven teleport

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Brimhaven teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport just outside the Brimhaven house portal. It can be created at level 40 Construction by using a scroll of redirection on a teleport to house tablet.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Brimhaven teleport
Brimhaven teleport
Released26 September 2013 (Update)

Quest itemNo

ExamineThis tablet has been redirected to the Brimhaven portal.

Advanced data
Item ID11745

The Brimhaven teleport is a magic tablet that can be broken by players to teleport just outside the Brimhaven house portal. It can be created at level 40 Construction by using a scroll of redirection on a teleport to house tablet.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
  • 2 Possible uses
    • 2.1 Bank
    • 2.2 Nearby locations
    • 2.3 Other advantages
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Creation[edit | edit source]

Requirements
SkillLevelXP
Construction40 (nb)0
Members
Ticks1 (0.6s)
Materials
ItemQuantityCost
Teleport to house1476
Scroll of redirection1N/A
Total Cost476
Brimhaven teleport1N/A

Possible uses[edit | edit source]

Bank[edit | edit source]

East Ardougne, Tzhaar City bank in Karamja Volcano, Shilo Village 20 coin round-trip by cart (after Shilo Village).

Nearby locations[edit | edit source]

Karamja, Brimhaven Agility Arena, Shilo Village, Tai Bwo Wannai, Catherby, Crandor and Brimhaven Dungeon.

Other advantages[edit | edit source]

Close bank for players who've completed Shilo Village (using the cart service), Karamja Diary, fruit tree patch and Calquat patch, Charter ship nearby.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 October 2017
(update)

The examine text was changed. Previously, it was "A tablet containing a magic spell."

12 May 2016
(update | poll)

The teleport tablet was given another graphical update.

30 April 2015
(update | poll)

The teleport tablet was given a graphical update.
